system.description:
You have both genuine divine power and leadership authority at your disposal. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • At the start of your turn, if you have no uses of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.qc8h2qnq0of52qct]{Rallying Surge} remaining, you can spend a use of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.s4iiatrup3e3virw]{Channel Divinity} to recover all uses of Rallying Surge (no action required).
  • Half of your Marshal levels count as cleric levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.nghsyyxk1mmuud2x]{Sacred Office} feature.
  • Half your cleric levels count as marshal levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ugkefg2rmcgqh9bn]{Followers} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.n706mca2whprmh74]{Martial Renown} features.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in cleric, 3 levels in marshal
